recommended_treatment: Total hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy and lymph node assessment; adjuvant pelvic radiation therapy with vaginal brachytherapy and consideration of systemic chemotherapy
description: High-grade endometrioid adenocarcinoma with malignant squamous differentiation measuring 4 cm, invading >50% of the myometrium (pT1b), no cervical or lymph node involvement (pN0), corresponding to FIGO stage IB.
patient_notes: The report shows a high-grade cancer in the lining of your uterus that has invaded more than half of the muscle layer but is confined to the uterus and lymph nodes. Your care team will recommend additional therapy based on standardized guidelines to reduce the risk of recurrence.

verification.assessment: The extracted FIGO stage IB and pathologic stage pT1b pN0 are consistent with >50% myometrial invasion and no nodal involvement as reported. Medical inference validation identified issues: The subtype and staging are correctly selected and consistent, but adjuvant treatment recommendations per NCCN for stage IB high-grade endometrioid carcinoma are missing.

change_explanations.recommended_treatment: Changed from 'Not specified' to 'Total hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy and lymph node assessment; adjuvant pelvic radiation therapy with vaginal brachytherapy and consideration of systemic chemotherapy'
